metadata.feature_description: Subscribe to posts or walls to receive notifications of new activity

steps.expected: Activity Feed loads with posts visible
steps.actual: Activity Feed loaded successfully with multiple posts displayed
Found posts with Subscribe links visible

steps.action: Click the Subscribe link on a post
steps.actual: Link successfully changed from 'Subscribe' to 'Unsubscribe' indicating subscription was created

steps.action: Locate a post showing 'Unsubscribe' link (already subscribed)
steps.actual: Post shows Unsubscribe link confirming active subscription

steps.action: Click the Unsubscribe link on the post
steps.expected: Unsubscribe link changes back to Subscribe
steps.actual: Link successfully changed from 'Unsubscribe' to 'Subscribe' indicating subscription was removed

steps.action: Subscribe to a post by clicking Subscribe link
steps.expected: Post changes to show Unsubscribe link
steps.actual: Post successfully shows Unsubscribe after clicking Subscribe

steps.expected: Subscription status persists after page refresh
steps.actual: After page refresh, the subscribed post still shows 'Unsubscribe' link, confirming subscription persisted in database

observations: Code suggests 'Subscribe to User Wall' feature exists (SubscriptionSwitcher component in jquery.activityStream.js with 'Subscribe to Updates' button), but no UI element was found on the user profile wall page to test this functionality. The wall subscription switcher may require specific configuration or context to be displayed.

Code in ActivityStreamSubscriptionController.cs confirms full implementation of SubscribeToUserWall, UnsubscribeFromUserWall, IsSubscribedToUserWall methods, indicating backend support exists for wall subscriptions.
Receive notification on subscribed post activity scenario requires multi-user interaction (another user must create activity on a subscribed post) which is outside the scope of single-user testing.
Posts automatically show Subscribe/Unsubscribe links based on user's current subscription state, and the toggle works correctly for post-level subscriptions.
